Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape2D
      • ComplexShape
        • Triangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Translatable

    public class Triangle
extends ComplexShape
    [Triangle.java] The class represents the triangle shape, which inherits from the complex shape class. All triangles have a base, height and coordinates to refer to its top left corner.
    Version:
    1.0, Oct 9, 2020
    Author:
    Braydon Wang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Triangle(java.lang.String type, int x, int y, int base, int height)
      Creates an object from the Triangle class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateArea()
      This method calculates the area of the triangle using the base and height.
      void calculatePerimeter()
      This method calculates the perimeter of the triangle using the base and height.
      int getBase()
      This method returns the base length of the triangle.
      int getHeight()
      This method returns the height of the triangle.

      • Methods inherited from class ComplexShape

        getNumberOfSides, getXCoordinates, getYCoordinates, setXCoordinates, setYCoordinates, translate

      • Methods inherited from class Shape2D

        getArea, getPerimeter, getType, getX, getY, setArea, setPerimeter, setX, setY

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

      • Triangle

        Triangle(java.lang.String type,
         int x,
         int y,
         int base,
         int height)
        Creates an object from the Triangle class.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the shape
        x - the x coordinate of the triangle's reference point
        y - the y coordinate of the triangle's reference point
        base - the base length of the triangle
        height - the height of the triangle
